text.section:
Except as otherwise provided in this section, an applicant for registration shall:
file with the Commissioner:
an application in the form that the Commissioner requires; and
a prospectus for the franchise; and
pay an application fee of $500.

Instead of the application for registration and prospectus described in subsection (a) of this section, the Commissioner may accept an application for registration and prospectus that:
are found by the Commissioner to include disclosure requirements similar to those of this subtitle; and
are:
required by a unit of the federal government or another state government; or
approved by an association of administrators of state franchise laws.
The applicant shall sign and verify the application for registration.
